content: You cannot find peace by avoiding life
author: Virginia Woolf

content: The strongest principle of growth lies in the human choice
author: George Eliot

content: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional
author: Haruki Murakami

content: Believe you can and you're halfway there
author: Theodore Roosevelt

content: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life
author: Steve Jobs

content: The only way to do great work is to love what you do
author: Steve Jobs

content: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going
author: Sam Levenson

content: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts
author: Winston Churchill

content: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary
author: Vidal Sassoon

content: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart
author: Roy T. Bennett

content: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

content: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it
author: Henry David Thoreau

content: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened
author: Dr. Seuss

content: The purpose of our lives is to be happy
author: Dalai Lama

content: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

content: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream
author: C.S. Lewis

content: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value
author: Albert Einstein

content: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude
author: Zig Ziglar

content: It always seems impossible until it's done
author: Nelson Mandela

content: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take
author: Wayne Gretzky

content: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

content: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm
author: Winston S. Churchill

content: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have
author: Thomas Jefferson

content: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step
author: Lao Tzu

content: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions
author: Stephen R. Covey

content: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible
author: Charles Kingsleigh

content: The best way to predict the future is to create it
author: Peter Drucker

content: Don't wait. The time will never be just right
author: Napoleon Hill

content: Nothing in the world can take the place of Persistence. Talent will not; nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. The slogan 'Press On' has solved and always will solve the problems of the human race
author: Calvin Coolidge
